events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I purchased.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for a money back.
The case has been assigned to support agent Maria who will handle the refund process for this issue.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund for your incorrect order.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received as well as your order number so that I can process your refund quickly?
Here is the photo of the wrong item I received, along with my order number 123456789. Please proceed with the refund.
We have received your photo and order number, and I have initiated the refund process. You should see the amount credited back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response and processing my refund quickly. I appreciate your assistance with this matter.
The refund has been completed successfully and a confirmation email has been sent to you. Please contact us if you need further help.
We are following up to ensure that your refund was received properly and that you have no further issues with your order.
As no further issues have been reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for your patience and have a great day!
